member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.User.FindCreateCompany(System.String)
member.summary: This function will attempt to find the company referenced by the user who is registering/updating information on the web site using a simple search on the company name specified. If the company name is not found, then this method will create a new company, using the company name provided along with the address information provided by the person.

member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.eBusiness.User.FindCreatePerson(System.String)
member.summary: This function will attempt to find the person referenced by the user who is registering/updating information on the web site. The base class implementation of this method is a simple search on the person name specified. If the name is not found, then the method will create a new person, using the company ID of the current user provided along with the address information provided by the for that company.
